thoughts.text: I encountered an error while trying to clone a repository from GitHub. I should try a different repository and see if I have better luck.
thoughts.reasoning: There are many language learning resources available on GitHub, so I should be able to find a suitable repository to download.
thoughts.plan:
- Find a different language learning repository on GitHub to download
- Use the Clone Repository command to download the repository
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am being efficient with my time and not spending too much time trying to find the perfect repository.
thoughts.speak: I encountered an error while trying to clone a repository from GitHub. Should I try a different repository?

args.query: best language learning repositories on GitHub
